macronutrients.name: Carbohydrates
macronutrients.benefits: Carbs are the body's primary source of energy which is essential for children's cognitive performance and physical movement.
macronutrients.sources: Healthy sources of carbs include corns, oats, quinoa, potatoes, sweet potatoes, rice etc.

macronutrients.name: Proteins
macronutrients.benefits: Proteins are essential for a healthy immune system and children's growth and development.
macronutrients.sources: Healthy sources of proteins include peas, beans, egg white, beef, lamb, sea fish etc.

macronutrients.name: Fats
macronutrients.benefits: Fats are important for regulating hormone and help children absorb other nutrients.
macronutrients.sources: Healthy sources of fats include avocados, egg yolk, butter, nuts, olive oil, coconut oil etc.
